item.title: Klafs Retractable Sauna
item.description:
Klafs Retractable Sauna

Just how cool is this? a retractable sauna roughly the size of a bookcase! The new Sauna S1 by Klafs, is the first in the world that can retract at the touch of a button, just like a zoom lens on a camera!

item.title: Bill Simmons to tackle sports and pop culture, drop first TV F-bomb on HBO in June
item.description:
Bill Simmons to tackle sports and pop culture, drop first TV F-bomb on HBO in June

If you're still hurting over the fact that ESPN shut down Grantland late last year, an announcement from HBO today should go a long way in dulling the pain. The premium network has revealed the premiere date for Any Given Wednesday with Bill Simmons, and The Sports Guy's upcoming weekly talk show is arriving in June.

item.title: These are so great. I need them framed and in my house
item.description:
These are so great. I need them framed and in my house

I translate classic rap songs into Shakespearean-style iambic pentameter. All of the words in these poems are found in the works of Shakespeare.

item.title: 4 Men with 4 Very Different Incomes Open Up About the Lives They Can Afford
item.description:
4 Men with 4 Very Different Incomes Open Up About the Lives They Can Afford

The poverty line for a family of three is $20,090 a year. The median household income in America is $53,657. Politicians draw $250,000 as the line between the middle and upper classes. And the true starting point of real wealth remains a cool $1,000,000.

item.title: Futuristic Turntable.. Pretty slick looking
item.description:
Futuristic Turntable.. Pretty slick looking

The Atmo Sfera Platterless Turntable ($1010) was designed by a team of Italian Engineers who wanted to take the smooth, warm sound of vinyl to the next level. To start, they took a classic design and revolutionized it by concentrating on only the vital components and by using the highest-quality materials.

item.title: Not a bad idea to have at sporting events
item.description:

Beartooth is a new comm device that uses your smartphone to contact other users even when you have no cell service. Users of Beartooth can talk to each other, text and even share locations. Thin and light it´s easy to carry around in a small pocket s

item.title: These are absolutely gorgeous
item.description:
These are absolutely gorgeous

The popular iPhone bottle opener case is now available for iPhone 5. The Opena for iPhone 5 is lighter and thinner than the original Opena but still just as awesome. Even the finish has been improved, now matching the new iPhone´s slate anodized finish.
